phrs.translation: 释放, 参政, 解放, 扩大投票权

sentences.sentence: Followed by a passionate lecture on the enfranchisement of women.
sentences.translation: 然后就妇女解放问题发表一篇热情洋溢的演讲。

sentences.sentence: He wrote, There was much criticism of my support for the enfranchisement of women.
sentences.translation: 他写道，有很多人批评我支持妇女解放。

sentences.sentence: He demanded the enfranchisement of every white man no matter what his status education fortune or work.
sentences.translation: 他要求给每一个白人以公民权也不论其社会地位如何受教育程度高低财产多寡何种职业。
